褾字的基本解释

褾
biǎo
袖口：“子敬便取书之，草正诸体悉备，两袖及褾略周。”
衣物的绲边：褾领。
古同“裱”。

褾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biǎo］
［《廣韻》方小切，上小，幫。］
同“裱1”。
(1)袖端。
(2)服饰的绲边。
(3)同“裱”。

褾字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　褾； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1123第15
【唐韻】方小切【集韻】【韻會】俾小切，?音㟽。【類篇】褾，袖端也。【增韻】卷裘飾也。　又【集韻】?妙切，標去聲。【玉篇】衣袂也。　【類篇】或作?、裱。

褾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
褾字的起名意思

暂无。

Fu
Basic explanation of words
Fu
biǎo
Cuffs: "Zi Jing will take the book, and the whole body is well prepared, two sleeves and a small circle."
Rims of clothing: collars.
The ancient same "mounting".
Fu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biǎo］
["Guangyun" Fang Xiaoqie, Shangxiao, help. ]
Same as "Mount 1".
(1) Sleeve end.
(2) Rims of clothing.
(3) Same as "mounting".
Fu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　褾; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1123 Page 15
【Tang Yun】Fang Xiaoqie【Jiyun】【Rhyme Club】Fang Xiaoqie,? Yin 㟽. [Class articles] Fu, sleeve ends also. [By rhyme] Volume fur is also decorated.　 [Ji Yun] again? Miao cut, the mark goes to the sound. 【Jade articles】Clothes are also.　【Classes】Or make?, mount.

Name meaning
Nothing.
biǎo
(1) 袖端 front part of a sleeve
(2) 衣服上的绲边 tape on clothes
(3) 书皮; 皮套 cover
